card.name: Abductor
card.text: One strike. Effect: Each successful strike does not wound a character, but rather places them off to the side with this card. After the attack has been faced, if any characters were placed off to the side, this card becomes a permanent event host which takes the characters prisoner at the site the attack was keyed to. The rescue attack is Men — 2 strikes at 9 prowess.

card.name: Adûnaphel
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Adûnaphel the Ringwraith. One strike. May be keyed to Brown Lands, Dagorlad, Gorgoroth, Western Mirkwood, and to sites in these regions. Detainment against a Ringwraith player’s companies. Special: If your opponent is not a Ringwraith Player, may also be played as a permanent event. If so, the following apply: Action: Use one against the hazard limit and discard this card to tap any one character. Action: Use one against the hazard limit and discard this card to access hazards from your sideboard.

card.name: Agburanar

card.name: Akhôrahil

If so, the following apply: Action: Use one against the hazard limit and discard this card to lower any one character’s body by 1 until the end of the turn. Action: Use one against the hazard limit and discard this card to access hazards from your sideboard.

card.text: Two strikes. Attacker assigns all strikes.

card.name: Assassin
card.text: One strike. Three attacks. All attacks/strikes must be assigned to the same character. Special: Effects which modify the number of strikes do not affect this card. Action: Tap a character in the defending company to cancel an attack from this card. This may be done up to twice.

card.name: Awaken Denizens
card.text: The number of strikes of all automatic-attacks at all {R} are doubled. May not be duplicated.

card.name: Awaken Minions
card.text: The number of strikes of all automatic-attacks at all {S} and {D} are doubled. May not be duplicated.

Additionally, +2 prowess to all automatic attacks at sites in Hollin, Redhorn Gate, and Wold & Foothills (including the attack created by this card). If Galadriel is in play and not at Lórien, the {H} version of Lorien becomes a {F}. Trigger: If any player reveals a non-hazard manifestation of the Balrog from their hand, discard this card.

card.text: Does not affect a Ringwraith Player. Corruption checks caused by the use of Palantíri or by effects which allow you to search through a play deck or discard pile outside the normal sequence of play are modified by a further -3. May not be duplicated.

Any successful strike by Tom or William causes the defending character to discard all non-special items they control.

card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character who does not control the One Ring. The character’s player makes a roll and adds his unused general influence. If the result is less than 11, the character returns to his player’s hand and all cards he controls are discarded.

card.text: Playable on an elf character moving through a {c}. The character’s player makes a roll and adds the elf’s mind. If the result is less than 13, that character splits off from his company and returns to his site of origin. If the character’s player wishes, this character may attempt to move to the site he was attempting to move to after the original company has finished their movement/hazard phase.

Detainment against a Ringwraith player’s companies. Special: If your opponent is not a Ringwraith Player, may also be played as a permanent event. If so, the following apply: Action: Use one against the hazard limit and discard this card to cause all S to become D until the beginning of your opponent’s next turn. Action:Use two against the hazard limit and place this card in your sideboard to bring one card directly from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Alatar
card.text: Unique. Avatar. -5 mp if eliminated. You may not play this card if your opponent is Fallen Alatar. When drawing cards based on Alatar’s movement, your opponent’s maximum possible draw is reduced by 1. Special Movement: If at a H when one of your companies is facing an attack, Alatar may immediately join that company, moving through no regions. This movement may occur outside of the movement/hazard phase and is not subject to the normal process of movement. After the attack is faced, Alatar must tap if possible and make a corruption check.

card.name: A Chance Meeting
card.text: Playable during the organization phase. One character may be brought into play under EI (or under GI if your avatar is there) at any H, F, B, or R. This is in addition to the one character limit.

card.name: A Friend or Three
card.text: Playable on an untapped Diplomat. Tap the diplomat. One corruption check or influence check in the Diplomat’s company is modified by adding the number of characters in the company.

card.name: Align Palantír
card.text: Playable on a Palantír in the same company as a sage. The bearer of the Palantír has the ability to use the Palantír. Discard this card if the bearer of the Palantír moves. If the palantír is stored, this card is also stored. May not be duplicated on a given Palantír.

card.name: Anduin River
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Ranger delcares region movement during the organization phase. The company may treat the following regions as adjacent: Rohan and Dagorlad, Anórien and Dagorlad, Lebennin and Ithilien, Lebennin and Harondor. Additionally, if the site moved to is in one of the above regions, the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of one. Discard this card if the company contains no Rangers or at the end of the turn. Trigger: If this card is discarded while the company is moving, the company must return to their site of origin.

card.name: Andúril
card.text: Unique. Playable on an untapped Sage during the site phase at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the sage and the site. The sage makes a corruption check. May not be discarded unless the bearer leaves play. May not be transferred. Special: If at a H, you may discard a stored Reforging to place Andúril with Narsil. This card is worth 7 mp when so placed.

card.name: Army of the Dead
card.text: Unique. Only playable by Aragorn II on the same turn he uses Paths of the Dead. No influence check is made. This faction may not be influenced or discarded.

card.name: Ash Mountains
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Ranger declares region movement during the organization phase. The company may treat the following regions as adjacent: Dagorlad and Gorgoroth, Horse Plains and Gorgoroth. The company faces an attack at the beginning of step 8 of the movement process: Orcs — 4 strikes at 8 prowess. Discard this card if the company contains no Rangers or at the end of the turn. Trigger: If this card is discarded while the company is moving, the company must return to their site of origin. Special: A company using this card may move to Mount Doom using region movement.

card.name: Athelas
card.text: Action: A Dúnadan bearer may tap himself and discard this item to heal a character in his company from wounded to tapped or Action: If any manifestation of Aragorn II bears this item, he may tap himself and discard this item to remove a corruption card on a character.

card.text: Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the result of test: Magic Ring: Less than 1 through 7 Dwarven Ring: 10 through 12 The One Ring: 12+ Lesser Ring: Any result

card.name: Favor of the Valar
card.text: Unique. When the card play action of this card resolves, shuffle your hand and play discard pile into your play deck, place your discarded sites in your location deck, and draw eight cards. Additionally, the number of mp required to end the game increases by 7.

card.name: Fellowship
card.text: Playable on a company containing at least four characters/allies at a H during the organization phase. All characters in the company receive +1 prowess. All corruption checks made by characters in the company are modified by +1. Discard if a character or ally leaves the company for any reason.

card.name: Fog
card.text: Environment. While Gates of Morning is in play, all f become b, all d become s, and all b and s not already affected by this card become w. May not be duplicated.

card.text: Playable on a company containing an untapped Ranger during the organization phase. Tap the Ranger. No creatures may be keyed to w against the company. Discard at the end of the turn or if the company no longer contains a Ranger.

card.name: Gates of Morning
card.text: Environment. When this card’s card play action resolves, discard all hazard environment cards and cancel all hazard environment effects. May not be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Glamdring
card.text: Unique. Weapon. If borne by a Warrior, +3 to prowess.

card.text: Unique. May not face strikes. Action: Tap Goldberry to cancel a card play action declared earlier in the same chain of actions which would return her company to their site of origin.

card.name: Sméagol
card.text: Unique. Action: Tap Sméagol if there are less than three characters in his company to cancel an attack. Action: If at the same site as any player’s The One Ring, you may tap and discard Sméagol to discard The One Ring.

card.name: Gollum's Fate
card.text: Playable if Sméagol (or any player’s manifestation thereof) is at Mount Doom and your bearer of the One Ring is at Mount Doom. You win the game.

card.name: Great Ship
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company that has declared movement. Discard at the end of the turn. Action: If the company’s site path contains at least c c, tap a character in the company to cancel an attack keyed to c by name or type. Action: If the company’s site path contains at least c c, tap a character in the company to cancel the card play action of an event whose effect depends upon the presence of a c.

card.name: Great-road
card.text: Playable on a company at a H that has declared movement during the organization phase. The opponent may draw up to double the normal amount of cards when this company moves. Discard at the end of the turn. Special Movement: At the beginning of the end-of-turn phase, replace the company’s current site with the site at which they began the turn.

card.name: Great-shield of Rohan
card.text: Shield. +2 to body to a maximum of 9. Action: If borne by a Warrior facing a strike, tap this card to eliminate the -3 penalty for remaining untapped against the strike.

card.text: Unique. Special Movement: If Gwaihir’s controlling character is the only character in his company and not at an Under-deeps site, tap Gwaihir to declare movement to any site not in a d, s, or Under-deeps. The company moves through no regions during the movement/hazard phase.

card.text: Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike. Cancel the strike.

card.text: Armor. +2 to body to maximum of 9. If borne by a Warrior, the maximum is 10.

card.name: Healing Herbs
card.text: Action: Bearer may tap himself and discard this item to untap a character in his company or Action: Bearer may tap himself and discard this item to heal a wounded character in his company to an untapped state.

card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dwarves +2, Elves -2

card.text: Spell. Playable on a company containing an avatar facing an attack. All characters in the company receive +2 prowess. Your avatar makes a corruption check modified by -2. Discard when the attack is faced.

card.name: Knights of Dol Amroth
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain +1

card.name: Lapse of Will
card.text: The prowess of each attack is modified by -1. The prowess of Nazgûl attacks is modified by a further -3.

card.name: Leaflock
card.text: Unique. Action: During his movement/hazard phase, you may tap Leaflock to cancel the card play action of a hazard declared earlier in the same chain of actions. Trigger: If not at a site in Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pûkel-Land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate during the site phase, discard Leaflock.

card.name: Lesser Ring
card.text: Lesser Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Lesser Ring.

card.name: Lordly Presence
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat making an influence check. Diplomat receives +5 to the check. Trigger: If the influence check succeeds, draw a card.

card.name: Lossoth
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +1

card.name: Lucky Search
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Scout at a S or D. Tap the Scout. Reveal cards from the top of your play deck on at a time until you reveal a non-special item. Place the item with the Scout. The Scout faces a strike at a prowess of 3 plus the number of cards revealed; this strike cannot be canceled. After the strike is faced, shuffle all other revealed cards into the play deck and discard the item if the Scout was wounded by the strike. The scout makes a corruption check.

card.name: Lucky Strike
card.text: Playable on a Warrior facing a strike. You may make two rolls and choose which one to use.

card.name: Magic Ring of Courage
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Warrior, -2 to the body of any attacks against his company. Otherwise, bearer gains the Warrior skill.

card.name: Magic Ring of Lore
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Sage, you may tap the bearer during the site phase to untap a site where Information is playable. Otherwise, bearer gains the Sage skill.

card.name: Magic Ring of Nature
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Ranger, you may take the following Action: Tap the bearer to cancel the card play action of one environment card declared earlier in the same chain of actions. Otherwise, bearer gains the Ranger skill.

card.name: Magic Ring of Stealth
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Scout, you may tap Magic Ring of Stealth to cancel an attack or tap Magic Ring of Stealth to cancel a strike. Otherwise, bearer gains the Scout skill. Action Trigger: Bearer makes a corruption check when this ring is tapped.

card.name: Magic Ring of Words
card.text: Magic Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates a Magic Ring. If the bearer is a Diplomat, +3 EI. Otherwise, bearer gains the Diplomat skill.

card.name: Men of Anfalas

card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +1

card.name: Mirror of Galadriel
card.text: Playable on a character at Lórien. You may look at your opponent’s hand. You may also look at the top five cards of either his play deck or yours — return these cards to the top of the play deck in any order you wish. Character makes a corruption check.

card.name: Miruvor
card.text: Bearer may discard to give +2 to body to all characters in his company until the end of the turn.

card.name: Misty Mountains
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Ranger declares region movement during the organization phase. The company may treat the following regions as adjacent: Rhudaur and Aduin Vales, Rhudaur and Wold & Foothills, Hollin and Wold & Foothills, Hollin and Fangorn, Dunland and Fangorn. Additionally, if the site moved to is in one of the above regions, the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of one. Discard this card if the company contains no Rangers or at the end of the turn. Trigger: If this card is discarded while the company is moving, the company must return to their site of origin.

card.name: Moon
card.text: Environment. While Gates of Morning is in play, all b not already affected by this card become f and all w become b. While Doors of Night is in play, all s not already affected by this card become w and all d become s. May not be duplicated. Special: This card is neither discarded nor canceled by Doors of Night.

attr.value: Orcs - 4 strikes at 9 prowess; Trolls - 3 strikes at 10 prowess; Trolls - 2 strikes at 11 prowess; Nazgûl - 1 strike at 15 prowess

This site may only be moved to by region movement by a company whose site of origin is in Dagorlad. If a company contains any non-scouts, they must enter the site during the site phase. To leave this site, make a roll during step 2 of the movement process and subtract the number of non-Scouts in the company. If the result is less than 7, the company may not move.

card.name: Mountains of Shadow
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Ranger declares region movement during the organization phase. The company may treat the following regions as adjacent: Ithilien and Gorgoroth, Ithilien and Nûrn, Harondor and Nûrn. The company faces an attack at the beginning of step 8 of the movement process: Orcs — 4 strikes at 9 prowess. Discard this card if the company contains no Rangers or at the end of the turn. Trigger: If this card is discarded while the company is moving, the company must return to their site of origin. Special: A company using this card may move to Mount Doom using region movement.

card.name: Muster
card.text: Playable on a character with the Warrior and Diplomat skills who is making an influence check against a faction. Add the character’s prowess to the influence check.

card.name: Narsil
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable by Aragorn II at Rivendell during the site phase. May not be stored or transferred. If Andúril has been placed with this item, these bonuses are instead +4 to prowess and +2 to EI. Action: If Andúril has been placed with Narsil, tap Narsil to untap a Dúnadan in the bearer’s company.

card.name: Narya
card.text: Unique. Playable on Gandalf. Action: Tap Narya for the following effects: Until the end of the turn, Gandalf gains +4 prowess, +1 body, and +2 EI. All characters in Gandalf’s company untap. Gandalf makes a corruption check modified by -4.

card.name: Nenya
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel Action: Tap Nenya for the following effects: Until the end of the turn, Galadriel gains +2 prowess, +2 body, and +2 EI. Any one corruption check declared earlier in the same chain of actions is automatically successful. Galadriel makes a corruption check modified by -1 (-3 if not at a H).

card.name: New Friendship
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat. One influence check by a character in the Diplomat’s company receives a +3 bonus or one corruption check by a character in the Diplomat’s company receives a +2 bonus.

card.name: Old Friendship
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat. One influence check against a character by the Diplomat is modified by +5 or one corruption check by a character in the Diplomat’s company is modified by +4.

card.name: Old Road
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped character at an untapped H. Tap the character. Character makes an influence check against a faction playable in the same or adjacent region as the H. The check is modifed by -1 and is not modified by the character’s EI. Tap the H if the faction is successfully played, and the faction’s current region is the region of the H.

card.name: Orcrist
card.text: Unique. Weapon. +3 to prowess to a maximum of 9. Against an Orc strike, this modification becomes +4 to a maximum of 10. If borne by a Warrior, this modification becomes +4 to no maximum.

card.name: Palantír of Amon Sûl
card.text: Unique. Palantír. If the bearer’s company contains less than two characters/allies, the company may not declare movement. 5 mp if stored. Trigger: If the bearer’s company is moving and contains less than two characters/allies, the company must return to their site of origin. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap this card to look at your opponent’s hand or to duplicate the Action of any version of Palantír of Elostirion or Palantír of Annúminas if either is in play. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Annúminas
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap this card to look through your play deck, discard pile, or sideboard for any card playable on a Sage and to bring such a card to your hand. Shuffle your play deck if searched. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Elostirion
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at the White Towers. If bearer is a sage, your hand size increases by one. Trigger: Discard this card if the bearer moves. Action: If bearer is a Sage, you may tap Palantír of Elostirion to discard a corruption card on any Elf or avatar you control.

card.name: Palantír of Minas Tirith
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at Minas Tirith. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Minas Tirith to look at the top 5 cards of your play deck and replace them in any order you choose. Repeat this process for your opponent’s play deck. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Orthanc
card.text: Unique. Palantír. Playable at Isengard. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap Palantír of Orthanc to bring one card from your play discard pile to your play deck and shuffle. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Palantír of Osgiliath
card.text: Unique. Palantír. If the bearer’s company contains less than four characters/allies, the company may not declare movement. This card is worth 5 mp when stored. Trigger: If the bearer’s company contains less than four characters/allies and is moving, the company must return to their site of origin. Action: With its bearer able to use a Palantír, tap this card to discard any one hazard permanent-event or long-event in play or to duplicate the Action of any version of any other Palantír in play. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Paths of the Dead
card.text: Playable on Aragorn II during the organization phase if his company is at Dunharrow or the Pûkel-deeps. Special Movement: Play Vale of Erech as the new site for Aragorn II’s company. The company moves through no regions. Any undead creatures may be keyed to the site against this company; no other creatures may be keyed. Discard this card at the end of the turn. Trigger: If the company no longer contains Aragorn II, eliminate all other members of the company.

card.name: Persuasive Words
card.text: Playable on a Diplomat making an influence check. Make two rolls and choose which one to use.

card.name: Potion of Prowess
card.text: Bearer may discard to give +1 prowess to all characters in his company until the end of the turn.

card.name: Praise to Elbereth
card.text: While this card is in play, no player may declare an action associated with a Nazgûl which is in play as a permanent event. Action: Tap a character to discard one Nazgûl permanent-event or to cancel a Nazgûl or Ringwraith strike.

card.name: Precious Gold Ring
card.text: Discard this item when tested. If you have one in your hand, you may play a Ring Special Item based on the result of the test: Magic Ring: Less than 1 through 5 Dwarven Ring: 8 through 12 The One Ring: 10 through 12+ Lesser Ring: Any Result

card.name: Quiet Lands
card.text: Environment. Playable on a site with at least one automatic attack. The base number of strikes for automatic-attacks at this site is reduced to half its original number (round up) or Playable on a S if Gates of Morning is in play. The S becomes a R or Playable on a s region card if Gates of Morning is in play. The s becomes a w. In all cases, discard at the end of the turn.

card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain +1

card.name: Rangers of the North
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain +1

card.text: Unique. +5 to bearer’s EI against characters with Edoras as a home site. Any influence check the bearer makes against the Riders of Rohan faction is automatically successful.

card.name: Red Book of Westmarch
card.text: Unique. Playable at Bag End even if the site is tapped. +2 EI against Hobbit characters. If stored, this card is worth 1 mp..p.

card.name: Reforging
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Sage at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Sage and the site. May be stored at a H during the organization phase. Action: If this card is stored, you may tap a Sage at a H during the organization phase to search your play deck, discard pile, and/or sideboard for one non-unique minor or major item weapon/armor/shield/helmet and place it with a character in the Sage’s company. Reshuffle the play deck if searched.

card.name: Rescue Prisoners
card.text: Playable during the site phase on a company at a tapped S or D. Company faces an attack: Spiders — 2 strikes at 7 prowess. Immediately after this attack is faced, tap a character to place this card with the character; otherwise, this card is discarded. A character controlling this card may not untap. May be stored at a H, F, or B during the organization phase. This card gives its mp when stored.

card.name: Return of the King
card.text: Unique. Playable on Aragorn II if he is at Minas Tirith and Denethor II is not in play.

card.name: Riders of Rohan
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain +1, Hobbits +1

card.name: Ringlore
card.text: Playable during the site phase on an untapped Sage at an untapped site where Information is playable. Tap the Sage and the site. Action: Discard this card to test a Gold Ring Item in the Sage’s company. No roll is used; instead, you may play any Ring Special Item other than The One Ring from your hand for which the ring could normally be tested.

card.name: Risky Blow
card.text: Playable on a Warrior facing a strike. The Warrior receives +3 to prowess and -1 to body. Discard when the strike is faced.

card.name: Roäc the Raven
card.text: Unique. May make influence checks against factions as though a character. Action: Tap this ally to reveal a faction from your hand and make an influence check against it with a +2 bonus. If successful, play the faction (tapping no site) with a current region which contains one of their home sites. Trigger: Discard this card if a successful influence check is made with this ability.

card.name: Sacrifice of Form
card.text: Spell. Playable before strikes are assigned on a Wizard (not a Fallen Wizard) facing an attack other than Company vs. Company Combat. The attack’s body is modified by -3 and all strikes of the attack automatically fail. Place the Wizard and all item cards he controls off to the side with this card; discard any other cards (including followers) he controls. You may not play a different avatar than the card placed off to the side. Trigger: Reveal a copy of your Wizard from your hand during the organization phase to place all cards set off to the side with this card at a H of your choice. Your avatar receives +1 to corruption checks. May not be duplicated on a given avatar.

card.name: Sapling of the White Tree
card.text: May not be played at a S or D. May be stored during the organization phase at Minas Tirith.

card.name: Scroll of Isildur
card.text: Unique. Playable at Minas Tirith. All Ring Tests in bearer’s company are modified by +2.

card.name: Secret Entrance
card.text: Playable when a company containing an untapped Sage declares movement during the organization phase. Tap the Sage. If the company’s site path contains no d, no hazard creatures may be keyed by site on the company. Discard if the company no longer contains a Sage or at the end of the turn.

card.name: Secret Passage
card.text: Playable when a company declares movement during the organization phase. If the company is moving to a R, no hazard creatures may be keyed by region on the company. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.text: Unique. Also playable by Gandalf at Gandalf’s current site. Action: If controller’s company contains up to a maximum of the controller and one Hobbit, tap Shadowfax during step 10 of the movement process to enable the company to move again.

card.name: Shield of Iron-bound Ash

card.name: Skinbark
card.text: Unique. Trigger: If not at a site in Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate during the site phase, discard Skinbark.

card.name: Southrons
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dwarves -2, Dúnedain -2, Elves -2

card.name: Star-glass
card.text: Action: Tap this item to cancel an attack by Undead. Bearer makes a corruption check. Action: Tap this item to modify the prowess of a spider or animal attack by -2.

card.name: Stars
card.text: Environment. Playable on an Undead attack. The attack’s prowess is reduced by 1 or Playable on a d region card if Gates of Morning is in play. The d becomes a s. Discard when an affected attack has been faced or at the end of the turn.

card.name: Stealth
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company containing a Scout that contains no more than three characters/allies. No creature cards may be played on the company. Discard if the company contains more than three characters/allies or no longer contains a Scout. Otherwise, discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Sting
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Bearer receives +1 prowess. If bearer is a Hobbit, this modification is instead +2.

card.name: Stone of Erech
card.text: Unique. Playable on the Men of Lamedon faction if you control them.

card.name: Sun
card.text: Environment. All Dúnadan characters receive +1 prowess. If Gates of Morning is in play, all attacks receive -1 prowess, all Man characters receive +1 prowess, and all Dúnadan characters receive an additional +1 prowess. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Sword of Gondolin
card.text: Weapon. Bearer receives +1 to prowess. If bearer is a Warrior, this modification is instead +2.

card.text: +4 to an influence check against a faction. May not be duplicated on a given influence check.

card.name: Test of Lore
card.text: Playable on a Sage. Action: You may discard this card to test a Gold Ring Item in the Sage’s company. -1 to the roll.

card.name: The Arkenstone
card.text: Unique. Playable at the Lonely Mountain. Bearer receives +3 EI against Dwarf characters. +3 to influence checks by the bearer against Dwarf factions. If bearer is a Dwarf, values in parenthesis apply. Action: Tap this card to untap a Dwarf in the same company; the Dwarf makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: The Cock Crows
card.text: Playable on a company facing a Troll attack. Cancel the attack or Playable if Gates of Morning is in play. Discard one hazard permanent-event.

The Elf’s prowess is modified by +1 and if Gates of Morning is in play, the prowess of each Elf is modified by a further +1 or Playable on a w region card if Gates of Morning is in play. The w becomes a b or Playable on a b if Gates of Morning is in play. The b becomes a f. In all cases, discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: The Mithril-coat
card.text: Unique. Armor. Bearer receives +3 to body.

card.name: The Old Thrush
card.text: Playable on a company facing a Dragon attack before strikes are assigned. The attack receives -3 to prowess and body. May not be duplicated. Discard this card after the attack is faced.

card.name: The One Ring
card.text: Unique. The One Ring. Playable after a Ring Test indicates The One Ring. Bearer receives +5 to prowess to a maximum of double his starting prowess. All characters in the bearer’s company including the bearer receive an additional corruption point. Action: Bearer may make a corruption check when facing a non-undead, non-Nazgûl, non-Ringwraith strike to cancel the strike.

card.name: The White Tree
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have a Sage at Minas Tirith during the organization phase and have stored a Sapling of the White Tree there. Any characters at the hero version of Minas Tirith during the untap phase may heal as though at a H. Minas Tirith’s site type is considered a H for the purpose of playing and interpreting hazard as well as for agent actions.

card.name: Thorough Search
card.text: Playable on an untapped Scout during the site phase. Tap the Scout. You may play any non-greater item that is listed as playable on the site’s card. This does not tap the site, and the item may be played at an already tapped site.

card.name: Tom Bombadil
card.text: Unique. Action: Tap Tom Bombadil to cancel a hazard played against his company before its card play action resolves. Trigger: If not at a site in Cardolan or Arthedain during the site phase, discard Tom Bombadil.

card.name: Torque of Hues
card.text: Unique. Action: Tap bearer and this item to cancel an attack against the bearer’s company. Bearer makes a corruption check.

card.name: Tower Guard of Minas Tirith
card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain +1

card.name: Treebeard
card.text: Unique. Trigger: If not at a site in Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pûkel-Land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate during the site phase, discard Treebeard. Special: Treebeard’s controller gains a +3 modification to influence checks against the Ents of Fangorn faction.

card.name: True Fána
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar facing an attack other than Company vs. Company Combat before strikes are assigned. Make a roll and add the avatar’s current prowess. If the result is greater than the attack’s current prowess, all of the strikes fail and are considered assigned and faced. Otherwise, the attack proceeds normally. In all cases, the avatar makes a corruption check modified by -3.

card.name: Use Palantír
card.text: Playable on a Sage. Sage gains the ability to use a Palantír he controls. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Vanishment
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar facing an attack. Cancel the attack. Avatar makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Vilya
card.text: Unique. Playable on Elrond. Action: Tap Vilya for the following effects: Until the end of the turn, Elrond gains +4 prowess, +2 body, and +6 EI. If Elrond is at Rivendell, take up to three resources cards from you discard pile and shuffle them into your play deck. Elrond makes a corruption check modified by -4.

card.name: White Mountains
card.text: Playable when a company containing a Ranger declares region movement during the organization phase. The company may treat the following regions as adjacent: Old Pûkel-Land and Anfalas, Rohan and Anfalas, Rohan and Lamedon, Anórien and Lamedon. Additionally, if the site moved to is in one of the above regions, the hazard limit is decreased by two to a minimum of one. Discard this card if the company contains no Rangers or at the end of the turn. Trigger: If this card is discarded while the company is moving, the company must return to their site of origin.

card.name: Wizard's Fire
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar facing a strike. Avatar receives +5 to prowess. Avatar makes a corruption check modified by -3. Discard after the strike is faced.

card.name: Wizard's Flame
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar. All attacks against the avatar’s company receive a -2 modification to prowess. Avatar makes a corruption check modified by -4. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.name: Wizard's Laughter
card.text: Spell. Playable at any time when an influence check will be made against one of your characters or resources and your avatar is in play. The influence check automatically fails. Your avatar makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Wizard's Ring
card.text: Lesser Ring. No Ring Test is required to play this card. This card may be played by an avatar at a H. May not be stored or transferred. Bearer makes a corruption check immediately after this card is played. May not be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Wizard's River-horses
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar. When the card play action of this card resolves, all Nazgûl events are discarded and all actions declared through use of a Nazgûl card that have not resolved yet are canceled. Avatar makes a corruption check modified by -2.

card.name: Wizard's Test
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar. Action: You may discard this card to test a Gold Ring Item. Make two rolls and choose which one to use. After the ring has been tested, the avatar makes a corruption check modified by -1.

card.name: Wizard's Voice
card.text: Spell. Playable on an avatar. Avatar receives +6 EI. Avatar makes a corruption check modified by -3. May not be duplicated on a given avatar. Discard at the end of the turn.

card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +1, Elves +1, Dwarves -2

card.text: Unique. Standard Modifications: Men +1

This site may only be moved to using region movement from a site in Imlad Morgul, Gorgoroth, Udûn, or Nurn. Hazard creatures may be keyed to this site regardless of countering effects in play. The base hazard limit against any company at or moving to this site is modified by +2.
Orcs - 3 strikes at 7 prowess; Orcs - 2 strikes at 8 prowess

Characters at this site may heal during the untap phase as though it were a H. One non-unique ally may be played at this site during the site phase regardless of its normal home site, even if the site is tapped.
This site untaps during the untap phase.
Orcs - 2 strikes at 8 prowess; Spider - 1 strike at 18 prowess

If a manifestation of Shelob has been defeated, the second automatic-attack is removed. To leave this site, make a roll during step 2 of the movement process and subtract the number of non-Rangers in the company. If the result is less than 9, the company may not move.
Men — This attack has a number of strikes equal to the number of characters in the company; each strike is at 6 prowess (detainment)
Smaug's Lair. If a manifestation of Smaug has been defeated, remove the automatic-attack. This site contains a hoard.
Pûkel-Creature - 1 strike at 9 prowess; Pûkel-Creature - 1 strike at 9 prowess
The only Greater Items that may be played here are Palantíri
